thread.title: This defender completely whiffed on the ball for as funny a goal as you'll see today
thread.title_full: This defender completely whiffed on the ball for as funny a goal as you'll see today

title: This defender completely whiffed on the ball for as funny a goal as you'll see today
text:
Feb 23, 2017 at 6:19p ET 0Shares 
Jannik Vestergaard had the ball at his feet without much pressure. All he had to do was make a simple pass, or even boot it up the field. He had any number of options, but one bad option was completely missing on his attempt to kick the ball. And yet that’s what he did. 
There are a lot of bad own goals. There are a lot of defensive mistakes. Rarely do defenders completely miss a slowly rolling ball with no one around them and end up on their rear end, though. This is an all-timer. 
Bless Vestergaard. Without him, we wouldn’t have laughed quite so hard today. 0
